elements.text:
You're working on a report with a few colleagues and need to report some statistics. A colleague suggests that you change the statistics so that your report looks better, but that would be lying.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: My colleagues are going to laugh at me for saying I don't want to include fake numbers.
My colleagues will not want to work on another report with with me, but I'm proud of myself for doing the right thing.
My colleagues decide to change the statistics, but I know I can go to my supervisor if I'm concerned.
I want to write this report without lying.
People will think that the report is good.
